backupJobFailedQuery:
AddonAzureBackupJobs
| where JobOperation == "Backup" 
| where JobStatus == "Failed"
| extend FailedJobDetails = strcat("Backup Item: ", BackupItemFriendlyName, ", Management Type: ", BackupManagementType, ", Time Generated: ", TimeGenerated)
| summarize Count = count(), FailedJobs = make_list(FailedJobDetails) by JobStatus
asrCriticalHealthQuery:
AzureDiagnostics  
| extend ReplicationAgent = column_ifexists("replicationProviderName_s", "")
| extend ReplicationHealth = column_ifexists("replicationHealth_s", "")
| extend Name = column_ifexists("name_s", "")
| where ReplicationAgent in ("InMageRcm", "A2A")   
| where ReplicationHealth == "Critical"  
| where isnotempty(Name) and isnotnull(Name)   
| summarize hint.strategy=partitioned arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name   
| summarize count()
asrRPOExceeds30Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| extend ReplicationAgent = column_ifexists("replicationProviderName_s", "")
| extend RPOTime = column_ifexists("rpoInSeconds_d", 0)
| where ReplicationAgent in ("InMageRcm", "A2A")
| where RPOTime > 1800
| summarize count()
VMMemUtilizationQuery:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Memory"
| where CounterName == "Available Bytes" or CounterName == "Committed Bytes"
| summarize UsedBytes = sumif(CounterValue, CounterName == "Committed Bytes"),
            AvailableBytes = sumif(CounterValue, CounterName == "Available Bytes")
            by Computer
| extend MemoryUtilization = UsedBytes * 100 / (UsedBytes + AvailableBytes)
| project Computer, MemoryUtilization
VMFreeSpaceQuery:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1m)
| where CounterName contains "% Free Space"
| summarize LatestValue = arg_max(TimeGenerated, CounterValue) by Computer
VMOfflineQuery:
let defaultAzureActivity = datatable (_ResourceId: string, ActivityStatus: string, Category: string, OperationName: string) [ ];
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(5m)
| summarize HeartbeatCount = count() by Computer, _ResourceId
| join kind=leftanti (
    union AzureActivity, defaultAzureActivity 
    | where ActivityStatus == "Succeeded"
    | where Category == "Administrative"
    | where OperationName == "Deallocate Virtual Machine"
    | summarize by _ResourceId
    )
    on _ResourceId
